title: Should've Put a Ring on It

sources.title: Should've Put A Ring On It | Full Romantic Comedy Movie
sources.description:
**This film is under license from Vision Films Inc.  All rights reserved**

Should've Put A Ring On It - Thea plans on proposing to Jamar. Much to her chagrin, he expresses men should play the traditional role in marriage. She's scrambles to remove all traces of the surprise engagement party before he finds out. Will he now put a ring on it?

2011
Stars: Robin Givens, Miguel A. Núñez Jr., Bobby V
